    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_0fa36b78c00ffee00f21eb58756a985de0378e3a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_0fa36b78c00ffee00f21eb58756a985de0378e3a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Current flow and slope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktueller Fluß und Steigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoulement et pente actuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fluxo e inclinação atuais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Flusso e pendio correnti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρούσα ροή και κλίση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flujo y cuesta actuales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the slope of the hill is gentler than the slope on the sea. This is because the current on the hill flows slowly than on sea.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slope</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die Steigung des 
Hügels leichter als die Steigung auf dem Meer ist. Dieses ist, 
weil der Strom auf dem Hügel langsam als auf Meer fließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que la pente de la 
colline est plus douce que la pente sur la mer. C'est parce que 
le courant sur la colline circule lentement que sur la mer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a inclinação do 
monte é mais delicada do que a inclinação no mar. Isto é 
porque a corrente no monte flui lentamente do que no mar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che il pendio della 
collina è più delicato del pendio sul mare. Ciò è perché la
corrente sulla collina circola lentamente che sul mare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ότι η κλίση του λόφου 
είναι ευγενέστερη από την κλίση στη θάλασσα. Αυτό είναι 
επειδή το ρεύμα στο λόφο ρέει αργά απ'ό,τι στη θάλασσα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la cuesta de la 
colina es más apacible que la cuesta en el mar. Esto es porque 
la corriente en la colina fluye lentamente que en el mar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hügel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">collines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inclinação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendio</string>
          </keyword>
